plugins.name: ios-app-icon
plugins.description: Generates iOS app icons from SVG files using rsvg-convert, supporting modern single-size (Xcode 14+), dark/tinted variants (iOS 18), and legacy all-sizes modes

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Guides Claude through creating effective skills for Claude Code, following Anthropic's official skill authoring best practices

plugins.name: zed-notify
plugins.description: macOS notifications for Claude Code events via terminal-notifier, with smart suppression when the project's Zed window is focused
